Text: Why not buy this comic instead of downloading it. It's better on paper and you'll be supporting the artists rather than stealing from them. It's not like they make a lot of money from this stuff and it's pretty cheap to buy
Well, I for one live in France where it's impossible to find, especialy in english (I loathe translation)
why not stay off a torrent site if you have a problem, "mr. i'll preach about downloading this but i'll download other stuff"
why not buy the comic and then download it (or vice versa)? Or alternatively do what ever you're comfortable with, but don't throw stones if you live in a glass house.
